summary:
▪ 5+ years experience leading activities in audit processes, risks & social commitments
management and costs planning & control in English and Spanish.
▪ Expertise in designing and implementing risks, commitments and planning processes and
designing training programs.
▪ Experience in managing and developing a diverse and inclusive team by leveraging skills in
communication and change management.
▪ Results-driven problem solver with decision-making abilities, Organized, Responsible,
Flexible, Easily Adaptable.
